channel.title: Right Wing Nut Job
channel.description: Conservative talk show and commentary from a true right wing patriot touching on all subjects political with no holding back from the truth. All subjects political including President Bush, taxes, immigration, abortion, supreme court, Iraq, the War on Terrorism, Iran, Korea, China, jobs, and more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Truth Shall Set You Free
channel.itunes:author: Right Wing

All subjects political including President Bush, taxes, immigration, abortion, supreme court, Iraq, the War on Terrorism, Iran, Korea, China, jobs, and more.

item.title: Arabs Taking Over American Ports
item.description: President Bush wants to turn over operation of a major part of the American ports in many large cities to a company run by the United Arab Emirates. The decision was made in secret but came out last week. Congress is furious and so are the American people. Turning over operations of these strategically important ports to muslims is nothing short of insane.
item.dc:creator: Right Wing

item.title: Judge Alito Supreme Court Nominee
item.description: Judge Samuel Alito goes before the Senate Judiciary Committee today to begin hearings on his nomination to the United States Supreme Court. LIberal Democrats have promised fireworks in their never-ending quest to push their extremist political agenda on the court.
item.dc:creator: Right Wing

item.title: FairTax Opposition Answered
item.description: The final installment of discussion on the FairTax addresses some of the concerns of the opposition and identifies some of the misunderstanding surrounding the proposal. There is also discussion of the traitor John Kerry and his dishonorable comments about American troops.
item.dc:creator: Right Wing
item.itunes:summary: The final installment of discussion on the FairTax addresses some of the concerns of the opposition and identifies some of the misunderstanding surrounding the proposal. There is also discussion of the traitor John Kerry and his dishonorable comments about American troops.

item.title: The FairTax Explained
item.description: This edition continues discussion of The FairTax begun in edition #3, and focuses on the actual FairTax plan itself. Some discussion of the misconceptions of corporate taxation , the embedded costs of our tax code, and the costs of compliance with the tax code. The discussion follows the ideas outlined by Neal Boortz and John Linder in the book "The FairTax Book."
item.dc:creator: Right Wing
item.itunes:summary: This edition continues discussion of The FairTax begun in edition #3, and focuses on the actual FairTax plan itself. item.title: The FairTax
item.description: An introductory discussion of the concept of the FairTax, following the ideas outlined by Neal Boortz and Congressman John Linder in their book "The FairTax Book." This is part 1 of a 3 part discussion. Part 1 focuses on the history of the income tax in America, and how politicians over the past century have hoodwinked the American public into accepting it as inevitable. The FairTax is a national sales tax which would replace all other federal taxes.
